text:
[Verse]
Night sky feels alive
Stars dancing oh so bright
Dreams taking flight
In this endless light

[Verse 2]
We chase the gleam
Lost in cosmic streams
Hearts beat it seems
In these midnight dreams

[Chorus]
Oh the stars above
Filling us with love
In their light we shine
Endlessly divine

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the dark
Feel that magic spark
Light ignites the park
Guided by a lark

[Verse 4]
Universe in motion
Waves of pure emotion
Oceans of devotion
Just a brief notion

[Chorus]
Oh the stars above
Filling us with love
In their light we shine
Endlessly divine
title: The Stars Above
